Pre-Game Insights: Pakistani fast bowler Mohammad Amir is set to join the team in Ireland for the upcoming three-match T20 international series, although he will miss the opening match against the hosts.
The delay in Amir’s departure was attributed to the late issuance of his visa, which was facilitated through the efforts of Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Chairman Mohsin Naqvi.
Amir will be available for selection in the subsequent matches on Sunday and Tuesday.
